What are the treatments for Schwartz-Jampel syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Schwartz-Jampel syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Schwartz Jampel syndrome type 1  - National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke: Myotonia Information Page   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnosti
